There are a few places, for example:

1) https://github.com/rails/rails/blob/master/railties/test/isolation/abstract_unit.rb#L264

Here we access the bin file directly and invoke it.

2) https://github.com/rails/rails/blob/master/railties/test/application/rake_test.rb#L68-71

Similarly, here we go inside an application (created with the command above) and run generators and migrations.

These are examples of code that do something similar, if you are wondering the best place to put your test though, I suggest this file: https://github.com/rails/rails/blob/master/railties/test/generators/app_generator_test.rb
